original: 曹操測試狼顧之相後疑之、夢「三馬同槽」後更忌之；親勤職守、廢寢忘食使曹家安心。乃至諸葛亮送女裝亦能忍。
text: Cao Cao doubted the situation after testing the wolf, and even more jealous after dreaming of 'three horses in the same slot.' The Cao family feels at ease by being diligent and forgetting to sleep and eat. Even Zhuge Liang can tolerate sending women's clothing.
